docs.title: Corpusim
docs.text:
Corpusim is a Flight Simulator for the Human Body. The mission of Corpusim is assist in the elimination of disease.

Our contribution will help deepen the understanding of human A&P by direct interaction with the body at any region and at any scale.

The Corpusim project is about an open source ecosystem of mission-aligned contributors, to include developers, writers, funders, doctors, teachers, and scientists. To learn more about us, see Corpusim.com.

This documentation will help you use and build on Corpusim, the software.

  • Getting Started
  • Corpusim's Design and Architecture
  • Corpusim's Roadmap

The source for these docs is on GitHub.

Updated 2023-12-08

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:

docs.title: Roadmap to MVP
docs.text:
timeline
section Pre-MVP<br>(Pre-Alpha)
2024<br>JAN : 3DIG : UI : Content
section MVP<br>(Alpha)
2024<br>JUN : Cloud Corpusim : Iterative<br>Development : Maintenance
section Pre-Release<br>(Beta)
2025<br>JAN : Improved PCG : Database Integration : Complete Core Functionality
section Stable Release
2026<br>JAN : Data / ML Integration : Physiology Processes. Eg, Disease : Partnerships

Updated 2023-12-08
